data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Esmaeili, Hamid Reza, Sayyadzadeh, Golnaz, Seehausen, Ole (2016): Iranocichlapersa, a new cichlid species from southern Iran (Teleostei, Cichlidae). ZooKeys 636: 141-161, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.636.10571, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.636.10571
